msContents.summary: The text talks about the different varieties of weapons apart from administrative rules. (See Nītiprakāśikā: 1953-II intro.) The note before the guard folio mentions about the title and other related information about the manuscript. The information on the note - Vaiśaṃpāyananīti Nīti Vaiśaṃpāyan No 43 complete Grantha 84 pages 9 lines.

msItem.title: Nītiprakāśikā
msItem.author: Vaiśampāyana
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śrīmadgajānaṃ vāṇiṃ natvā brahmādisadgurūn nītiprakāśikā seyaṃ 1v 2 tanyate sādarānmayā .. 1.. śrīmattakṣaśilāyāṃ tu sūpaviṣṭaṃ varāsane janamejayaṃ mahārājaṃ draṣṭu 1v 3 kāmo mahātapāḥ .. 2.. vaiśampāyananāmā tu maharṣiḥ saṃśitavrataḥ abhyāgāt sahittaśśi 1v 4 ṣyai vyāsaśiṣyo mahāmuniḥ .. 3.. tamāyāntamṛṣiṃ śṛtvā janamejayabhupatiḥ
msItem.explicit:
43r 1 vaiśyo vā śudrajātīyaḥ striyo rājaparigrahāḥ . tve kīrtimanto bhūtveha paratra gatimāpnu 43r2 yuḥ .. 98 nītiśāstramidaṃ proktaṃ mayā te janamejaya saṃkṣepera gamiṣyāmi yatra vyāsogurū
43r 3 rmama .. 99.. vaiśaṃpāyana ityuktvā tatraiva sa jagāma ha pārikṣito pi mu 43r 4 mude sunītyā pālayan prajā .. 100.. (design of a flower)
msItem.finalRubric:
43r 4 iti śrīmannitiśāstre niniprakāśi
43r 5 kāyāṃ rājavyāpārakathanaṃnnāmāṣṭamo dhyāyaḥ ..(design of a flower) śrī……..
43r 6 vaiśaṃpāyananitissamāptā śrīrūkmaṇīsametaśrīpārtharārathave namaḥ ..

support.p: Thin palm leaf as a guard cover. ‘Front leaf is bound with one thread seems for the preservation.

extent.measure: 5 blank folio, 2 guard folio and 43 written
